body_html: torch/torch7#990 seems to fix the compile issue. At least with my combination of OS (CentOS7) /compiler (gcc 4.8.x)/etc tests were failing because ptrdiff_t is defined to be unsigned long (it definitely shouldn't be), and my attempt at quick workarounds didn't fix all the issues. You might want to try with an up-to-date compiler and see if it works for you.
body_text: torch/torch7#990 seems to fix the compile issue.  At least with my combination of OS (CentOS7) /compiler (gcc 4.8.x)/etc tests were failing because ptrdiff_t is defined to be unsigned long (it definitely shouldn't be), and my attempt at quick workarounds didn't fix all the issues.  You might want to try with an up-to-date compiler and see if it works for you.
body: https://github.com/torch/torch7/pull/990 seems to fix the compile issue.  At least with my combination of OS (CentOS7) /compiler (gcc 4.8.x)/etc tests were failing because `ptrdiff_t` is defined to be `unsigned long` (it definitely shouldn't be), and my attempt at quick workarounds didn't fix all the issues.  You might want to try with an up-to-date compiler and see if it works for you.
